TEXT.English: Disables Inquisitions. Inquisitors may not be trained and non-state religions may not be purged in order to reduce the threat of rebellion.
TEXT.French: Désactive les Inquisitions. Les Inquisiteurs ne ne peuvent pas être recrutés et les religions non-officielles ne peuvent pas non plus être éradiquées dans un ville pour en améliorer la stabilité.
TEXT.German: Disables Inquisitions. Inquisitors may not be trained and non-state religions may not be purged in order to reduce the threat of rebellion.
TEXT.Italian: Disables Inquisitions. Inquisitors may not be trained and non-state religions may not be purged in order to reduce the threat of rebellion.
TEXT.Spanish: Disables Inquisitions. Inquisitors may not be trained and non-state religions may not be purged in order to reduce the threat of rebellion.
TEXT.Finnish: Disables Inquisitions. Inquisitors may not be trained and non-state religions may not be purged in order to reduce the threat of rebellion.
